content.title: Goal
content.text: Galileo Fiesta PH aims to gather all projects, activities, manuals, and inventions made by Filipino individuals, groups, and communities that utilizes Intel's Galileo boards. It also aims to be an avenue for Filipino makers to showcase their work, be recognized, and inspire more people into the world of embedded systems and microelectronics.
